reviews.title: wonderful hotel!
reviews.text: I've stayed at this hotel 4 times in the last 5 months. It is brand new and is beautiful! They have a great breakfast area. The rooms are a good size and the bathrooms are very nice. The King rooms have cubby holes in the bathrooms for your "stuff". Everything is very clean and brand new! I would stay here again and would definately recommend it to everyone. Springfield is about 25 minutes from downtown Nashville, TN.
